name: mollie-commercetools-extension-module
author: Mollie
description: Integration between commercetools and mollie payment service provider

scripts.zip-gcp-function: npm ci && npm run build && cp build/gcpFunctionHandler.js build/index.js && npm run delete-specific-cloud-handlers && cp -R node_modules build/ && cd build && zip -r ../extension-module.zip . && rm index.js
scripts.zip-aws-lambda: npm ci && npm run build && cp build/lambdaHandler.js build/index.js && npm run delete-specific-cloud-handlers && cp -R node_modules build/ && cd build && zip -r ../extension-module.zip . && rm index.js
scripts.zip-azure-function: npm ci && npm run build && mkdir -p extension-azure/extension && cp build/azureHandler.js extension-azure/extension/index.js && npm run delete-specific-cloud-handlers && cp -R build/. extension-azure/extension/. && cp -R node_modules extension-azure/extension/. && cp -R config/azureFunction/. extension-azure/. && cd extension-azure && mv function.json extension/ && zip -r ../extension-module-azure.zip . && cd .. && rm -r extension-azure
